question: You recently bought a piece of computer equipment but it was broken. You work at home and you need this equipment for your work. Write a letter to the shop manager. In this letter:• describe the problem with the equipment• explain how this problem is affecting your work• say what you would like the shop to do
text: Hope my letter finds you well.
I am writing this letter to express my dissatisfaction regarding the computer equipment in your shop. Please be informed that I recently bought a printer in one of your branches in the Downtown area.

When I got home yesterday, I supposedly try to use the said item. Unfortunately, it is not properly  functional. I cannot print in colour. I already tried to use another set of ink still the result is the same. Kindly note that we need to print our 500 handout materials for my presentation last Friday, but I am unable to do it since the printer is not working. Although we solve it by using the service of the printing shop near our office, however, this is causing us an added costs. For example, imagine paying 500 pages.
Thus, I appreciated it if you could replace it or schedule a technician to fix it.
Looking forward to hearing from you.
